item.title: Boris Barbour
item.description: I think a two-state solution for Israel and Palestine is barely feasible and should maybe not be the objective. Inspired by Northern Ireland.This article argues in a vaguely similar direction, speaking of a (con)federation.https://www.middleeasteye.net/discover/shlomo-sand-jews-and-palestinians-we-have-no-choice-we-will-have-live-together
